law.catch_line: Household and dependent care service credit.
law.text: A resident individual may deduct from the tax computed under the provisions of KRS 141.020 a credit for household and dependent care services necessary for gainful employment. The credit shall be twenty percent (20%) of the federal credit allowed under Section 21 of the Internal Revenue Code.
law.history: Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. VII D, sec. 637, effective April 11, 1990.
